title: Debt older than 7 years
question: my old citibank bill went to a legal collection agency...the bill is more than 7 years old. Can they legally proceed with any legal action? what are my rights?
answers:
I am not licensed to practice law in your state.

This information is given for educational purposes only. No attorney-client relationship exists between us.

The statute of limitations in California is 4 years. So if there has been no payment on the card in 7 years, the creditor cannnot sue you to collect. If they do, you may have a claim for violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act. Try the link for an attorney in your area to assist you.
